languages.text: "Не думаю. Никто, кроме меня, не придавал планете особого значения. Кунрад, с другой стороны... Он проявил ко мне участие, когда я появилась на корабле, помог организовать аудиенцию с Теодорой, поддержал в стремлении побывать на планете. Я не говорила в открытую, зачем хочу туда отправиться, но, думаю, этот стервятник догадался, что дело в чем-то важном, связанном со святой верой {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. А что может быть слаще для еретика, чем осквернить святыню?!"

traits.locale_text: "Не думаю. Никто, кроме меня, не придавал планете особого значения. Кунрад, с другой стороны... Он проявил ко мне участие, когда я появилась на корабле, помог организовать аудиенцию с Теодорой, поддержал в стремлении побывать на планете. Я не говорила в открытую, зачем хочу туда отправиться, но, думаю, этот стервятник догадался, что дело в чем-то важном, связанном со святой верой {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. А что может быть слаще для еретика, чем осквернить святыню?!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "I doubt it. No one except me was particularly interested in the planet. Kunrad, on the other hand... He sympathised with me when I first came aboard, he helped arrange an audience with Theodora, and supported me in my effort to visit the planet. I never told him plainly why I wanted to go there, but I imagine that vulture must have figured out that it was something important, something related to the holy faith of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. And what could delight a heretic more than defiling a relic?"
languages.original_text: "Не думаю. Никто, кроме меня, не придавал планете особого значения. Кунрад, с другой стороны... Он проявил ко мне участие, когда я появилась на корабле, помог организовать аудиенцию с Теодорой, поддержал в стремлении побывать на планете. Я не говорила в открытую, зачем хочу туда отправиться, но, думаю, этот стервятник догадался, что дело в чем-то важном, связанном со святой верой {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. А что может быть слаще для еретика, чем осквернить святыню?!"

I never told him plainly why I wanted to go there, but I imagine that vulture must have figured out that it was something important, something related to the holy faith of the Imperium. And what can bring a heretic more delight than defiling a relic?"

languages.text: “恐怕并非如此。当时除了我之外，并没有其他人对那颗行星表现出任何兴趣。可另一方面，昆拉德……当我刚刚上船的时候，他就以同情的态度对待我，也是他协助安排了我与西奥多拉的会面，支持我前往那颗行星。我从来没告诉过他我为什么要去那里，但我猜，那只秃鹫肯定是猜到了某件重要的事情，某件与{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的神圣信仰相关的事情。对异端分子而言，还有什么能比玷污圣物更愉悦的事情呢？”
languages.original_text: "I doubt it. No one except me was particularly interested in the planet. Kunrad, on the other hand... He sympathised with me when I first came aboard, he helped arrange an audience with Theodora, and supported me in my effort to visit the planet. I never told him plainly why I wanted to go there, but I imagine that vulture must have figured out that it was something important, something related to the holy faith of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. And what could delight a heretic more than defiling a relic?"

traits.locale_text: “恐怕并非如此。当时除了我之外，并没有其他人对那颗行星表现出任何兴趣。可另一方面，昆拉德……当我刚刚上船的时候，他就以同情的态度对待我，也是他协助安排了我与西奥多拉的会面，支持我前往那颗行星。我从来没告诉过他我为什么要去那里，但我猜，那只秃鹫肯定是猜到了某件重要的事情，某件与{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的神圣信仰相关的事情。对异端分子而言，还有什么能比玷污圣物更愉悦的事情呢？”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Lo dudo mucho. Aparte de mí, nadie prestó demasiado interés al planeta. Por su parte, Kunrad... se compadeció de mí cuando subí a bordo, me ayudó a conseguir una audiencia con Theodora y apoyó mis esfuerzos por visitar el planeta. Nunca le dije por qué quería ir allí, pero supongo que ese buitre intuyó que se trataba de algo importante relacionado con la sagrada fe del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. ¿Y hay algo que le guste más a un hereje que profanar una reliquia?».
languages.original_text: "I doubt it. No one except me was particularly interested in the planet. Kunrad, on the other hand... He sympathised with me when I first came aboard, he helped arrange an audience with Theodora, and supported me in my effort to visit the planet. I never told him plainly why I wanted to go there, but I imagine that vulture must have figured out that it was something important, something related to the holy faith of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. And what could delight a heretic more than defiling a relic?"

traits.locale_text: «Lo dudo mucho. Aparte de mí, nadie prestó demasiado interés al planeta. Por su parte, Kunrad... se compadeció de mí cuando subí a bordo, me ayudó a conseguir una audiencia con Theodora y apoyó mis esfuerzos por visitar el planeta. Nunca le dije por qué quería ir allí, pero supongo que ese buitre intuyó que se trataba de algo importante relacionado con la sagrada fe del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. ¿Y hay algo que le guste más a un hereje que profanar una reliquia?».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「どうでしょうか。我以外、この星に特に興味を持つ者はいなかった。一方、クンラッドは…我が最初に乗船したとき、彼は我に同情し、シオドーラとの謁見の手配を手伝ってくれた。我がなぜその星に行きたいのか、その理由をはっきりと話したことはなかったが、あのハゲタカはそれが何か重要なこと、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の神聖な信仰に関わることだと察したに違いありません。聖遺物を汚すこと以上に異端者が喜ぶことがありますか？」
languages.original_text: "I doubt it. No one except me was particularly interested in the planet. Kunrad, on the other hand... He sympathised with me when I first came aboard, he helped arrange an audience with Theodora, and supported me in my effort to visit the planet. I never told him plainly why I wanted to go there, but I imagine that vulture must have figured out that it was something important, something related to the holy faith of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. And what could delight a heretic more than defiling a relic?"

traits.locale_text: 「どうでしょうか。我以外、この星に特に興味を持つ者はいなかった。一方、クンラッドは…我が最初に乗船したとき、彼は我に同情し、シオドーラとの謁見の手配を手伝ってくれた。我がなぜその星に行きたいのか、その理由をはっきりと話したことはなかったが、あのハゲタカはそれが何か重要なこと、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の神聖な信仰に関わることだと察したに違いありません。聖遺物を汚すこと以上に異端者が喜ぶことがありますか？」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Das bezweifle ich. Niemand außer mir hatte ein gesteigertes Interesse an dem Planeten. Das heißt ... Kunrad ... Er unterstützte mich, als ich zum ersten Mal an Bord kam, er half dabei, eine Audienz bei Theodora zu bekommen, und förderte mein Ansinnen, den Planeten zu besuchen. Ich habe ihm nie offen gesagt, warum ich dort hinwollte, aber der Geier hat bestimmt geahnt, dass es wichtig war und etwas mit dem heiligen Glauben des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} zu tun haben musste. Und was würde einen Ketzer mehr erfreuen als die Entweihung eines Relikts?"
languages.original_text: "I doubt it. No one except me was particularly interested in the planet. Kunrad, on the other hand... He sympathised with me when I first came aboard, he helped arrange an audience with Theodora, and supported me in my effort to visit the planet. I never told him plainly why I wanted to go there, but I imagine that vulture must have figured out that it was something important, something related to the holy faith of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. And what could delight a heretic more than defiling a relic?"

traits.locale_text: "Das bezweifle ich. Niemand außer mir hatte ein gesteigertes Interesse an dem Planeten. Das heißt ... Kunrad ... Er unterstützte mich, als ich zum ersten Mal an Bord kam, er half dabei, eine Audienz bei Theodora zu bekommen, und förderte mein Ansinnen, den Planeten zu besuchen. Ich habe ihm nie offen gesagt, warum ich dort hinwollte, aber der Geier hat bestimmt geahnt, dass es wichtig war und etwas mit dem heiligen Glauben des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} zu tun haben musste. Und was würde einen Ketzer mehr erfreuen als die Entweihung eines Relikts?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « J'en doute. Personne à part moi ne s'intéressait vraiment à cette planète. Kunrad, cependant... Il a sympathisé avec moi quand je suis montée à bord, il m'a aidée à obtenir une audience avec Théodora et il a soutenu mes efforts pour me rendre sur cette planète. Je ne lui ai jamais révélé le but exact de ce voyage, mais ce vautour a dû comprendre que j'avais une raison importante, liée à la foi sacrée de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Et qu'y a-t-il de plus tentant pour un hérétique que de profaner une relique ? »
languages.original_text: "I doubt it. No one except me was particularly interested in the planet. Kunrad, on the other hand... He sympathised with me when I first came aboard, he helped arrange an audience with Theodora, and supported me in my effort to visit the planet. I never told him plainly why I wanted to go there, but I imagine that vulture must have figured out that it was something important, something related to the holy faith of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. And what could delight a heretic more than defiling a relic?"

traits.locale_text: « J'en doute. Personne à part moi ne s'intéressait vraiment à cette planète. Kunrad, cependant... Il a sympathisé avec moi quand je suis montée à bord, il m'a aidée à obtenir une audience avec Théodora et il a soutenu mes efforts pour me rendre sur cette planète. Je ne lui ai jamais révélé le but exact de ce voyage, mais ce vautour a dû comprendre que j'avais une raison importante, liée à la foi sacrée de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Et qu'y a-t-il de plus tentant pour un hérétique que de profaner une relique ? »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Bilemiyorum Hür Tacir... Benim dışımda kimse gezegenle ilgilenmiyordu. Kunrad... Kunrad, gemiye ilk bindiğimde bana yakınlık gösterdi. Theodora'yla görüşme ayarladı ve gezegeni ziyaret çabamı destekledi. Orayı neden ziyaret etmek istediğimi Kunrad'a açıkça söylemedim. Ancak leş kokusu alan akbaba misali önemli bir şey olduğunu, {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} kutsal inancıyla alakalı bir şey olduğunu sezdiğine inanıyorum. Bir kâfir için bir yadigâra saygısızlık etmekten daha büyük bir keyif olabilir mi?"
languages.original_text: "I doubt it. No one except me was particularly interested in the planet. Kunrad, on the other hand... He sympathised with me when I first came aboard, he helped arrange an audience with Theodora, and supported me in my effort to visit the planet. I never told him plainly why I wanted to go there, but I imagine that vulture must have figured out that it was something important, something related to the holy faith of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. And what could delight a heretic more than defiling a relic?"

traits.locale_text: "Bilemiyorum Hür Tacir… Benim dışımda kimse gezegenle ilgilenmiyordu. Kunrad… Kunrad, gemiye ilk bindiğimde bana yakınlık gösterdi. Theodora'yla görüşme ayarladı ve gezegeni ziyaret çabamı destekledi. Orayı neden ziyaret etmek istediğimi, Kunrad'a açıkça söylemedim ancak leş kokusu alan akbaba misali, önemli bir şey olduğunu sezdiğine inanıyorum. {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un kutsal inancıyla alakalı bir şey olduğunu… Bir kâfir için bir yadigâra saygısızlık etmekten daha büyük bir keyif olabilir mi?
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
